attributes.additional_details:
The government plan to regulate e cigarettes as medicines.
What I propose is that they look at this again and leave things as they are now.

Why?
1) How many e cigarette smokers actually want there vapour to be regulated by the government? Have the government even conducted any polls into this matter? After all the government are supposed to be serving/helping us?
2) Does this mean that I can buy a prepaid prescription for the year at a one off cost of £104 and get all the vapour I want?
3) The government have not even looked into how much more is this going to cost me as a user without a prepaid prescription?
But fore-mostly surely the people who use vapour should be allowed a choice.
